group_1.textLeft: That's not exactly true...
The truth is...I wasn't alone...
If I was alone...by now, I would have...

group_1.textRight: What's wrong? You don't look so good.
I'm sorry, is something wrong?@You don't have to tell us...

group_1.textLeft: No, it's something I've never been able to talk@to anyone about...
Please listen to me...

group_1.narration: It was...when I had just become a Magical Girl.
That day, I was struggling with a Witch@that appeared near my school.
And that was when SHE appeared.
She was a Magical Girl from the same school as me.
She appeared just as I was about to be killed...@and quickly defeated that powerful Witch@and left...

group_1.textCenter: I am who I am today because of her...
But now, she no longer...even comes to school..
She must have been attacked by a Witch and died...

group_1.textRight: ...That was...But you don't need to need to worry@about it...

group_1.textLeft: Back then, she treated me like I was a "nuisance".
I think I made her angry and put her in a bad mood...
If only I had been stronger.
If I had been stronger, I might have been able to be friends with that girl.
If I had done that...maybe I could have saved her...
The more I think about it...the more pathetic I@realize I am...
Then why don't you be friends with us?
It's sad that the Magical Girl died, but...
It's made you stronger, and there's more you can@do now.
You can't say you're "responsible" if you're always looking backwards.

group_1.textRight: Hinano may be tiny, but she's very dependable.

group_1.textLeft: You've got a lot to say...
Friends...
I won't be able to forget that girl anytime soon, but...
Yes... Thank you very much!

group_1.textRight: By the way, that uniform belongs to Sakae@Academy, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yes.

group_1.textRight: And you said that you were saved by a Magical Girl@from the same school...?
Can you tell me the details again?

group_1.textLeft: Yes...

group_1.narration: "Huh... Why are you in such a place?"
"Hey, you there, you're being a nuisance."
"Even though I went through the trouble of giving you@special treatment in my collection!"
"I want you to get on with it and quiet down already!"
Huh? She...defeated it?@That powerful of a Witch?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, um! Thank you so much for saving me...!
Oh, huh...? I think you're...
(Oh...she's gone...)
(Ignored...of course...)
She said I was in her way...she must hate me...

group_1.textCenter: And that's how the story goes...

group_1.textRight: (I swear, Alina... She was just there to clean up@her own Witch...)

group_1.textLeft: (It's not her fault that Alina went missing in the@first place...)
(Should I...tell her the truth...? No, I can't do that...)

group_1.textCenter: (Alina... How are you up in heaven...?)
(I...now have wonderful friends thanks to you.)
(This life that you saved...I will devote myself to exterminating Witches with all my might!)
I'm not afraid of Witches anymore! ...Only a little.
